org.keycloak.keys

Interface SecretKeyProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KeyProvider<SecretKeyMetadata>, Provider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AesKeyProvider, HmacKeyProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FailsafeAesKeyProvider, FailsafeHmacKeyProvider, FailsafeSecretKeyProvider, GeneratedAesKeyProvider, GeneratedHmacKeyProvider, GeneratedSecretKeyProvider

    public interface SecretKeyProvider
extends KeyProvider<SecretKeyMetadata>
    Base for secret key providers (HMAC, AES)
    Author:
    Marek Posolda

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getJavaAlgorithmName()
      Return name of Java (JCA) algorithm of the key.
      SecretKey getSecretKey()
      Return the active secret key, or null if no active key is available.
      SecretKey getSecretKey(String kid)
      Return the secret key for the specified kid, or null if the kid is unknown.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.keycloak.keys.KeyProvider

        getKeyMetadata, getKid, getType

      • Methods inherited from interface org.keycloak.provider.Provider

        close

    • Method Detail

        SecretKey getSecretKey()
        Return the active secret key, or null if no active key is available.

        Return the secret key for the specified kid, or null if the kid is unknown.

      • getJavaAlgorithmName

        String getJavaAlgorithmName()
        Return name of Java (JCA) algorithm of the key. For example: HmacSHA256
        Returns:
